reporter-output.line:
T Given user is on flipkart homepage
P FlipKartHomePage verification Expected: a string containing "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles, Fashion, Books, Electronics, Home Appliances and More" Actual: was "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles, Fashion, Books, Electronics, Home Appliances and More" [View Screenshot]
T When user selects product Booties from 'Baby & Kids' category
T Then user should see product results
P Expected: a value greater than <0> Actual: <40> was greater than <0> [View Screenshot]
T When user sets 200 and 400 price
T And user selets price Price -- High to Low
T Then user should see only product less than max value
T When user select 2 product from product results
T Then user should see product details matching correctly
P Expected: a string containing "Love Crochet Art Booties" Actual: was "Love Crochet Art Booties (Toe to Heel Length - 9 cm Pink)" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "₹239" Actual: was "₹239" [View Screenshot]
T When user check for the delivery 560064
T And user selects add to cart
T Then product has been added to the cart
